website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Tab3 8 is a sturdy and relatively affordable Android tablet with built-in parental controls, but it doesn't offer particularly noteworthy performance.

customer_reviews.title: I like the kid mode so I don't have to worry ...
customer_reviews.text: Not badly all for the price. I like the kid mode so I don't have to worry when my kids are playing with it. It's been 2 months since my daughter has it and she plays with it every day. It seam to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Delightful tablet for casual users
customer_reviews.text: Delightful tablet for a delightful price. I opted for the 8 inch instead of the 7 inch version because it's slightly bigger but still fits into the inside pocket of a coat or jacket, it has a newer OS and it comes with better speakers. For a casual user like me, this is the cat's meow.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: VERY SLOW, almost unusably so.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has one fatal flaw. IT IS SOOO SLOW. Apps can take up to 1 minute to appear. Hit a key, wait a while. Typing also can be difficult as it's so slow you have to wait for it. I've had it a while, and tried and tried to find out if this one is defective, even factory resetting it twice. But again, it's just too slow to use. If they could fix the speed, the unit appears well designed and solid, the screen is beautiful, and it's very slim. Sad such a well built unit is soo slow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap tablet
customer_reviews.text: Decent tablet for the price. I bought this for my son because I wasn't willing to spend top dollar on an iPad or samsung tab. I've used other lenovo products in the past and it's been a pretty good brand so I chose this particular tablet for my son. He loves it and has had no issues with it so far. Having owned some higher end tablets, I personally don't really like the buttons/controls on this tablet. I dont like the layout or format of the menues and apps but that's just my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: belinda klemm

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet and wonderful digital clock
customer_reviews.text: For a general purpose tablet it seems sluggish. But as a single purpose device, it fits the bill. Since it's nearly impossible to find a nice looking clock (digital or otherwise) that actually KEEPS TIME, I was on the hunt for a tablet to use as a (um, rather expensive) desk clock. So for $100 (and $1.50 for a clock/date app), I have my clock, that yes, will actually keep time, right down to the second. Done.
customer_reviews.author: mdw

customer_reviews.title: Works great, couldn't ask for batted tablet at this price ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great , couldn't ask for batted tablet at this price point . Battery last me 12+ hours and I use it daily for logging and monitoring mimtie values within my car while driving/at the track
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Our great granddaughter has been using this project for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Our great granddaughter has been using this project for 2 years. The only complaint we have had is the slowness with which it turns on but then that may be true of all tablets. What do we really know of all of this new electronics stuff anyway. She is happy with it and it has continued to work in spite of her rough care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance tablet
customer_reviews.text: Better shop for other products like Samsung or Asus. This Lenovo Tab3 is sluggish, freezes up, and lacks user friendly features. Great screen resolution and speakers location is perfect! Battery is good. But the overall performance is underwhelming and i wish I would've bought another tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: have good cameras and the battery lasts almost all day under ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these tablets for a small hospital, they run very well, have good cameras and the battery lasts almost all day under extreme use! We purchased these from Supreme Deals 18 and are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Passion for Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it, however it freezes more than my old tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tablet, high quality construction. Screen is pleasant and so far has held up to normal use with no scratches. The tablet has been working flawlessly so far, mainly use it for browsing, listening to Podcasts and watching my Slingbox.
customer_reviews.author: maniak_man

customer_reviews.title: Better than most other tabs!
customer_reviews.text: A little on the slow end but excellent picture and sound quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Kp

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine until this morning
customer_reviews.text: Only used this tablet a handful of times. Worked fine until this morning. Won't power up.
customer_reviews.author: Neil S. Lenet

customer_reviews.title: Older is better
customer_reviews.text: I am not overly pleased with this item. My old Lenovo tablet was a lot nicer. This one freezes up to often and also goes to black screen on me when I'm in the middle of doing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi K Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Cord won't stay in plug at 10 months old.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased but charger cord will not stay plugged in and charge. Lasted about 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with my tablet
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my tablet. It is just the right size for my entertainment needs (books and video).
customer_reviews.author: Izzy bug

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: slowest, unresponsive tablet I have ever had. Must be a flaw in system.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Would not unlock
customer_reviews.text: I could not get past the Factory Reset Protection on the Google screen; it stayed locked. I am returning it to Amazon. Edit: Received the replacement via FedEx today. It set up easily and is doing exactly what I need. I wanted a cheap Android tablet to run Android Apps, mostly automation, around the house, instead of my phone. This is easier to see and will be used less frequently. Why I was sent a used, locked tablet first is a mystery. Larry
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Brodsky

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I love everything Lenovo. They work well for me and this Tab3 is no exception. It is just like a small portable computer without the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lil
customer_reviews.text: Family loves them. Writing review it now. Great lil product
customer_reviews.author: DandD

customer_reviews.title: Painfully slow
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful little tablet in every way, except painfully slow. Its' so bad I'm going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Boston_boricua

customer_reviews.title: A little slow but..
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I needed. A little on the slow side but okay for minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Romine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, user-friendly and very fast. No issues set itself plug n play.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good buy! Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my tablet. Something anyone of any age can enjoy. Works very well so far. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. McCurry II

customer_reviews.title: Slow and buggy find something else
customer_reviews.text: Slow and buggy it's an alright product if you can get it for less then 85 anything more go with another product
customer_reviews.author: Kayon Allen

customer_reviews.title: It only has 16GB of storage which is pretty pathetic in 2017
customer_reviews.text: A decent tablet as long as your expectations are too high. It only has 16GB of storage which is pretty pathetic in 2017. There really shouldn't exist tablets with less than 32GB at this point but that's a discussion for somewhere else. Anyway, it's a decent tablet for the price point. It won't "WOW" you but it gets the basic tasks done.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Decent budget tablet without much junkware
customer_reviews.text: Love the form factor, seems slower than my Tab2 A10, which was a surprise. Great for reading and watching videos though.
customer_reviews.author: Pardsbane

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product delivered - worthless!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a Lenovo but received a Dell tablet. Useless. Not compatible with Google Play and the App Store installed is very limited. Tried to fix it with help of local expertise and now it is to late to return
customer_reviews.author: Leif Bjermer

customer_reviews.title: Good little tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Great little tablet. Works great. Battery goes down quickly, just like all other tablets.No complaints. A bargain at this price. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrile product
customer_reviews.text: Runs entirely too slow, shuts down expectantly. Terrible product. Don't waste your money on this. Has no place to return to home screen
customer_reviews.author: Terry Van Gorp1

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a opened item... It has a very slow respond speed. Not what I expected from Lenovo
customer_reviews.author: G Shen

customer_reviews.title: Slow but still functional
customer_reviews.text: A little on the slow side, even with a memory card installed. Working as suppose to be for the main part of the reason for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this device as a gift to my wife and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The wifi will not stay on. It constantly turns itslf off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 3 of these (twin boys and a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these (twin boys and a replacement). They are very slow. Lags a lot with their games. Some are almost unplayable. I have made sure the software is up to date and reset everything. Have done everything that I can to make them run right, they just won't.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Vickers

customer_reviews.title: One is fine but another goes into boot loop often especially when ...
customer_reviews.text: Dropping down to 2 stars as one unit constantly goes into bootloop now. My kid is not happy. Got two units for my kids. One is fine but another goes into boot loop often especially when charged to 100%. After several reboots/repower that device can be used normally but really frustrating needing to go through all that. When being able to use the unit, the device is powerfull enough for kid's use such as youtube and light gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Shige-san

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: For me is one of the best tablets 8" in market!
customer_reviews.author: Fabiano

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong defected tablet
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive this tablet that I ordered . What I received the 10 inch Tab 2 tablet. At first I just accepted it since it is a bigger tablet bought the right size case for it along with a screen protector. Two and half weeks I discovered the battery was not charging and it went down from there. I sent it back and since I already had the case for 10 inch tablet I made sure the replaced tablet was 10 inch one. just got the new one yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA ABBOTT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Sluggish.. screen cracked didn't even drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price the tablet is excellent value for money
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: They are decent for the price. We bought a bunch of these to use for kids and they function more ore less okay. We don't have it loaded with many apps and the few apps it runs, it ends up hanging and we have to restart at least once a session with the kids. The graphics display is pretty good, but overall it is a little slow and tends to freeze.
customer_reviews.author: Howler R.

customer_reviews.title: Everything works great except his Roblox games
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson to play all his games. Everything works great except his Roblox games. After playing a day or two on Roblox it crashes. We have to continually uninstall and reinstall it. We have kept everything updated to try and prevent it, but haven't found the fix. Other than that, it is a nice tablet. The main reason we bought it was for that specific game, so it is a bit frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: the thing kept turning off every 5 seconds. Got ...
customer_reviews.text: the thing kept turning off every 5 seconds. Got in contact with Lenovo 24 hrs service and if you plug it in and it keeps doing that, then it is not working and you need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, time and energy
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it negative star if that was possible. Bought it for my husband on valentines day. He used it for 1 week and now I am returning it. It worked well for a few days then it started lagging. Press the home button and wait 10 solid minutes for it with only Facebook app running. It is so frustrating. It is impossible to use. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bashima

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good tablet, but it does seem to get bogged down at times, seems like it needs a processor that is a tweak faster or has more flash memory.
customer_reviews.author: Bykhyk

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has been a source of constant entertainment for my son who spends a lot of time in cars and buses and does not own a phone. Lenovo products laptops have always served me well, I expect the tablet will exhibit the same robustness.
customer_reviews.author: TTS

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet. Works perfect out of the box and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Works perfect out of the box and easy to understand
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good value 8 inch tablet
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, good quality display and audio. I agree with others that the tablet is a little slow in response. I have not had any problems with freezing, as reported by others, although the screen occasionally switches off when I am using.Kindle Overall this is good value for an inexpensive 8 inch tablet
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Frais MD

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: Omg i,wish I could give this zero. The tablet freezes constantly I feel like i wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: geo heaven

customer_reviews.title: You can only use it for basic web browsing. ...
customer_reviews.text: You can only use it for basic web browsing. The device is cheap for a reason - it is sadly under-powered and require lots of patience from its user.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Pepper

customer_reviews.title: too bad its a great looking and feeling tablet
customer_reviews.text: everything other negative reviews says about this tablet is true ...too bad its a great looking and feeling tablet.if Lenovo could fix them it could be a winner
customer_reviews.author: ANDRE

product_meta.title: Lenovo Tab 3 8, 8'' HD IPS Tablet (MediaTek 1.0 GHz Quad-Core, 1GB, 16GB, Android 6.0), Black ZA170001US
product_meta.description: The perfect companion for families who love entertainment like reading, movies, and games. Lenovo Tab3 8 is designed for multiuser sharing, so each family member has separate personal profiles and app configurations. Kids even have their own special interface, where you can control their access to websites and apps. Plus, the 8" HD display and Dolby Atmos audio actually adapt to the apps you're using. The Lenovo Tab3 8 is perfect for families that love to be entertained.
feature_bullets: 1 GB + 16 GB (WiFi), 16 GB + microSD, Up to 64 GB

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars111 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
